-00003ba0: 6561 7469 6e67 2065 7861 6d70 6c65 2070  eating example p
-00003bb0: 6c6f 7473 0a20 0a43 7265 6174 696e 6720  lots. .Creating

-00003bd0: 7473 2075 7369 6e67 2074 6865 2073 6561  ts using the sea
-00003be0: 7262 6f72 6e20 6d6f 6475 6c65 2e20 4272  rborn module. Br
-00003bf0: 6963 6b20 636c 6173 7320 7072 6f76 6964  ick class provid
-00003c00: 6564 2062 7920 7468 6520 7061 7463 6877  ed by the patchw
-00003c10: 6f72 6b6c 6962 206d 6f64 756c 6520 6973  orklib module is
-00003c20: 2069 6d70 6c65 6d65 6e74 6564 2061 7320   implemented as

-00003c50: 7360 2e20 2054 6865 7265 666f 7265 2c20  s`.  Therefore, 
-00003c60: 4272 6963 6b20 636c 6173 7320 6f62 6a65  Brick class obje

-00003c90: 6c6f 7420 6675 6e63 7469 6f6e 7320 7468  lot functions th
-00003ca0: 6174 2068 6176 6520 7468 6520 6061 7860  at have the `ax`
-00003cb0: 2070 6172 616d 6574 6572 732e 2020 0a0a   parameters.  ..
-00003cc0: 5768 656e 2063 7265 6174 696e 6720 6120  When creating a 
-00003cd0: 4272 6963 6b20 636c 6173 7320 6f62 6a65  Brick class obje

-00003d00: 7370 6563 6966 6965 642c 2061 6e64 2069  specified, and i
-00003d10: 7420 7368 6f75 6c64 2062 6520 756e 6971  t should be uniq
-00003d20: 7565 2061 6d6f 6e67 2074 6865 2042 7269  ue among the Bri

+00004d90: 7261 6e67 696e 6720 616e 6420 7374 6163  ranging and stac
+00004da0: 6b69 6e67 2070 6c6f 7473 0a0a 5468 6520  king plots..The 
+00004db0: 7061 7463 6877 6f72 6b6c 6962 206d 6f64  patchworklib mod
+00004dc0: 756c 6520 7072 6f76 6964 6573 2074 776f  ule provides two
+00004dd0: 206f 7065 7261 746f 7273 2022 2060 7c60   operators " `|`

+00004e40: 6f70 6572 6174 6f72 2077 696c 6c20 706c  operator will pl
+00004e50: 6163 6520 7468 6520 706c 6f74 7320 6265  ace the plots be

+00004e70: 2077 6869 6c65 2074 6865 2022 602f 6022   while the "`/`"

+00004e90: 7461 636b 2074 6865 6d2e 0a0a 6060 6070  tack them...```p
+00004ea0: 7974 686f 6e0a 2341 7272 616e 6765 2022  ython.#Arrange "
+00004eb0: 6178 312c 2220 2261 7832 2c22 2061 6e64  ax1," "ax2," and
+00004ec0: 2022 6178 3422 2068 6f72 697a 6f6e 7461   "ax4" horizonta
